pddl4j.exp.action
Interface ActionDef

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Term>, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractActionDef, Action, DurativeAction
public interface ActionDef
extends java.lang.Iterable<Term>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

This interface is implemented by all type of action defined in the PDDL language.

Returns true if a term occurs in the parameters of this action.

standardize

ActionDef standardize()
Standardizes all occurrences of the variables that occur in this expression. Remember that free variables are existentially quantified.

Returns:
a standardized copy of this expression.

normalize

ActionDef normalize()
Normalize this action. This method returns a copy of this action where:
  • each variable is standardized,
  • precondition expression is convert into disjunctive prenex normal form and
  • effect expression is is convert into conjunctive prenex normal form.

      • Returns:
      a normalize copy of this action.
      See Also:
      Exp.toPrenexNormaForm(), Exp.toConjunctiveNormalForm(), Exp.toDisjunctiveNormalForm()

clone

ActionDef clone()
Returns a deep copy of this action. Creates and returns a copy of this action. The precise meaning of "copy" is as follow: 
 x.clone() != x
will be true, and that the expression: 
 x.clone().getClass() == x.getClass()
will be true. While it is the case that: 
 x.clone().equals(x)
will be true. Finally, note that except type of term expression are deeply copy.

Returns:
a deep copy of this expression.
See Also:
Cloneable

toTypedString

java.lang.String toTypedString()
Returns a typed string of this action.

Returns:
a typed string of this action.
